name: 3D Shooter (Abhinav Arora)
description:
Here are the major modifications:

1) Each scene has a different theme, including the main menu.

2) There are 2 unique levels.

3) Post processing effects are there to make the game look better.

4) Added Arms to the player.

Here are the minor modifications:

1) Added Infinite health.

2) Removed the player's UI except for the pause menu and the crosshair.
